colorTheory.description: The color palette combines a professional and modern look by using a blend of teal, white, and dark gray with gold accents.
colorTheory.mood: The palette conveys a sense of professionalism, sophistication, and creativity.
colorTheory.accessibility: The text colors have high contrast against the background, ensuring readability. The accent color provides visual interest and contrast.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: The teal primary color stands out against the white background, while the dark gray secondary color complements it well. The gold accent color adds a touch of elegance and distinction.
